turns.speaker: user
turns.utterance: I'm calling about a car accident I was in last week. Claim number is 12345ABC. I'm just trying to get an update on the status. Honestly, this whole process is already stressing me out.

turns.speaker: agent
turns.utterance: Thank you for calling. I understand your frustration, and I'll do my best to assist you. I have located claim 12345ABC. The initial assessment is complete, and we are currently awaiting the police report before proceeding further. This usually takes around 7-10 business days from the date of the accident.

turns.speaker: user
turns.utterance: Okay, that'sâ€¦ somewhat helpful. But what about the damage estimate to my car? I need to know if it's even worth repairing, or if they're just going to total it. I can't be without a car for much longer!

turns.speaker: agent
turns.utterance: I see. I can check for that. Hmmm...It appears an appraiser has been assigned, but the estimate isn't yet available in the system. Can I call you back in 24 hours with that information?

turns.speaker: user
turns.utterance: 24 hours?! Look, I appreciate you checking, but honestly, what is taking so long? My insurance covers a rental, but I can't even start that process until I know if my car is totaled! And what happens if the police report shows I was even partially at fault when the other driver ran a red light? Will that affect what I get?
